text: @RandPaul @NYGovCuomo What a disgusting, venal, thoughtless creature you are @RandPaul . Perhaps if the idiot in chief hadn't dismissed Covid-19 as "a hoax", hadn't turned it into a partisan issue to point score, but had issued PPE etc from the start, there would have been fewer body-bags needed?
